item.title: Nvidia continues to assert its AI dominance. Using options to ride out gains while limiting risk
item.description: Tony Zhang breaks down this options strategy on Nvidia.

item.title: Oppenheimer sees a ‘golden opportunity’ in McDonald’s, upgrades fast-food giant
item.description: After over a year of stagnation, Oppenheimer sees upside of 17% ahead for shares of McDonald's.

item.title: Buy this lithium stock that's set for a major rally this year after a strong 2025, says Baird
item.description: Baird's new $210 price target implies a potential upside of 33% ahead for Albemarle.

item.title: Micron has been on fire. UBS sees even more upside ahead
item.description: UBS hiked its price target for Micron to $400, implying upside of 16% from here.

item.title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and Dow rose to records on Tuesday, with the blue-chip index closing above 49,000 for the first time.
